sheet_title: CalGreen A/A Checklist — Residential Mandatory Measures, Sheet 1
description: First sheet of the 2022 California Green Building Standards Code (CalGreen) Residential Mandatory Measures checklist with July 2024 Supplement. Covers Chapter 3 general scope, Chapter 4 divisions 4.1 (Planning and Design), 4.2 (Energy Efficiency), 4.3 (Water Efficiency), 4.4 (Material Conservation), and 4.5 (Environmental Quality). Includes EV charging, water fixture flow rates, waste diversion, and indoor air quality provisions.
key_content: CalGreen mandatory measures: 2022 edition with July 2024 Supplement
Division 4.1: Planning and Design — site development, stormwater management, EV charging provisions (4.106.4)
Division 4.2: Energy Efficiency — mandatory energy efficiency references
Division 4.3: Water Efficiency — kitchen faucets, lavatory faucets, showerheads (GPM limits), water closets max 1.28 GPF, urinals max 0.5 GPF
Division 4.4: Material Conservation — construction waste diversion 65% minimum (4.406.1)
Division 4.5: Environmental Quality — fireplaces (direct vent/sealed combustion), pollutant control, indoor air quality
EV charging: EVSE required for new single family and townhome construction (4.106.4.1)
Stormwater: SWPPP or erosion control plan required for construction (4.106.1)
Grading and paving: stormwater management plan required (4.106.3)
Outdoor water: landscape irrigation per MWELO (4.304.1)
VALUE NOT LEGIBLE: specific GPM flow rates for kitchen faucets, lavatory faucets, and showerheads
VALUE NOT LEGIBLE: specific EV charging amperage and voltage requirements
NOT SHOWN: checkbox completion status not determinable from image quality
